body_html:
I think this is a step in the right direction, but we should provide the operations that people want and are trying to use resize_ for:

  • numpy.reshape: basically equivalent to x.contiguous().view(sizes)
  • numpy.empty: create an empty (uninitialized) tensor of the same size
body_text:
I think this is a step in the right direction, but we should provide the operations that people want and are trying to use resize_ for:

numpy.reshape: basically equivalent to x.contiguous().view(sizes)
numpy.empty: create an empty (uninitialized) tensor of the same size
body:
I think this is a step in the right direction, but we should provide the operations that people want and are trying to use `resize_` for:

* numpy.reshape: basically equivalent to x.contiguous().view(sizes)
* numpy.empty: create an empty (uninitialized) tensor of the same size
